location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor etc in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Riach informs Elphinstone that Catchatoor Johannes had endorsed two sets of bills of exchange at Shiraz in favour of two named persons. The bills, which were in connection with His Majesty's mission to Persia, had been drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at Tehran, and were to be carried to the debit of His Majesty. Riach also explains the circumstances in which Johannes had been sent to Shiraz.
